actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require that congressional budget resolutions set forth 5-year target levels of budget authority, budget outlays, and Federal revenues.

summary.text: Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require that Congress set forth five-year target levels of budget authority, total budget outlays and Federal revenues. Requires the Congressional Budget Office to periodically prepare a comparison of the latest estimates of total budget authority, outlays, and Federal revenues and the corresponding target levels.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require that congressional budget resolutions set forth 5-year target levels of budget authority, budget outlays, and Federal revenues.
